channel.title: Hopefully someone can help me. Probably a simple problem
channel.description:
Well, I coded servers years back and needless to say, I've forgotten some things. I'm trying to set my environmental variables, however I don't have a classpath variable. I have the path one, but classpath is no where to be found. Should I create one, or what should I do? Every time I try and run it says "the system cannot specify the path" and I know this is the issue, but again theres no classpath in my environmental variables.
I should probably note that I am running a virtual machine (On a mac computer, running windows 7 iso). Is that the reason why? Any help would be appreciated. Thanks
Edit: I should also note that I did try adding a classpath under system variables myself but that doesn't seem to be helping.
